column1: Use improved schema of price re-indexing
column2: Use improved schema of price re-indexing

column1: Selecting Yes disables some minor checks at the process of price reindexing, speeding up the entire process of either product or price group resaving. Please use this setting if you're experiencing troubles with resaving at a product or price group level.
column2: Selecting Yes disables some minor checks at the process of price reindexing, speeding up the entire process of either product or price group resaving. Please use this setting if you're experiencing troubles with resaving at a product or price group level.
